skillTree.name: Giant Wolf
skillTree.description: If a Shaman wants to get especially sneaky an' nasty fast, he needs an especially growly Wolf.

skillTree.name: Arachnarok Spider (Catchweb Spidershrine)
skillTree.description: This enormous, revolting Arachnarok Spider shrine upon which the Shaman is borne forces even the branches of nearby trees to twist in revulsion at its diabolical passing.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -25% for all spells

skillTree.name: Nastier Squigs
skillTree.description: A Squig is an unconventional mount, but survivors say it has a certain charm.

skillTree.name: Goblintide
skillTree.description:
Ten Goblins? Inconvenient.
	A hundred? Alarming.
	A thousand? 
	Uh oh!

skillTree.name: Tunnel Boss
skillTree.description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

ui_effects.description: ➕50% chance to deal 72 direct damage to 1 entity per second

skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
skillTree.description: The targets of this spell are driven to go right for the 'hurty bitz' or sneak up on opponents at unexpected angles.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Sneaky Stabbin'"

ui_effects.description: ➖ Reduces power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vindictive Glare"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vindictive Glare Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Vindictive Glare Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Itchy Nuisance"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Gork'll Fix It"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Night Shroud"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Night Shroud Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Night Shroud Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Eyes on da Prize
skillTree.description: “Forget about da little stuff… we’s gonna get da biggest haul da tribes ever seen!”

skillTree.name: ‘urry up!
skillTree.description: “Get movin’ you gits! Da WAAAGH is ‘ere!

skillTree.name: Goblin Tinkerer Retinue
skillTree.description: These gobbos have an air of superiority about them, using their rudimentary understanding of physics and engineering to expedite the tribe’s technological superiority. They’re very persnickety about getting their building projects just right though..

skillTree.name: Slapped on Scrap
skillTree.description: “A bit o’ dis, a bit o’ dat, grab any o’ da metal fings and slap ‘em on.”

skillTree.name: Green is Best
skillTree.description: ‘Anyone who finks otherwise can zog right off.’

skillTree.name: Adorned by Teef
skillTree.description: ‘Da boss keeps all da best teef for himself. None of da boyz dare take anyfing until da boss ‘as ‘iz fill.’

skillTree.name: Furious WAAAGH
skillTree.description: ‘Des boyz are ready ta bash. Get movin’!’

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Da Gobbos
skillTree.description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
Melee defence: +2 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
Ammunition: +15% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
Missile strength: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
Melee attack: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
Melee defence: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
Ammunition: +20% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
Missile strength: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
Melee attack: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
Melee defence: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units

skillTree.name: Riderz
skillTree.description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

effects.description: Speed: +5% for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
Speed: +10% for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
Charge bonus: +10 for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
Speed: +15% for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units
Charge bonus: +20 for all melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units

skillTree.name: Da Boyz
skillTree.description: This Boss is one with "da boyz", egging the lads on to greater feats and to hit bigga stuff with their choppas.

effects.description: Missile strength: +3% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
Weapon strength: +3% for all Orc infantry units
Missile strength: +5% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
Melee attack: +4 for all Orc infantry units
Weapon strength: +5% for all Orc infantry units
Reload time reduction: +5% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
Missile strength: +10% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
Melee attack: +6 for all Orc infantry units
Weapon strength: +10% for all Orc infantry units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units

skillTree.name: ‘Ard as Nailz
skillTree.description: Ridin’ on chariots means ya can be even more fighty, an' even more killy!

effects.description: Armour: +4 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
Missile strength: +3% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
Armour: +8 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
Missile strength: +5% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
Range: +5% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
Armour: +12 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
Missile strength: +10% for all missile cavalry and chariot units
Range: +10% for all missile cavalry and chariot units

skillTree.name: Da Big Ladz
skillTree.description: Even bigga than a Black Orc, an' not bad at killin’ too!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
Melee attack: +4 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
Weapon strength: +5% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
Melee attack: +6 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
Weapon strength: +10% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units

skillTree.name: Deff From Abuv
skillTree.description: This Boss realises the power of "flyin’ fings” and so invests a few teef in making sure his war machines can fling fings really far and really high!

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units
Ammunition: +15% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units
Missile damage: +5% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units
Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units
Missile damage: +10% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabberz
skillTree.description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 10% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin, Squig Herd and Colossal Squig units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: 'Ard Ladz
skillTree.description: ‘Ardest of da ‘Ard. Don’t mess, gottit?

effects.description: Ward save: 5% for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +15 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Biggest ‘n' Strongest
skillTree.description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +10% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Savage Smartz
skillTree.description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

effects.description: Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile damage: +10% for Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for  Goblin Spear Chukkas, Goblin Rock Lobbers, and Doom Diver Catapults units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Deff From Below
skillTree.description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

skillTree.name: Iron-Hard
skillTree.description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Out-Clevering
skillTree.description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

skillTree.name: Mob Boss
skillTree.description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.

skillTree.name: Really Green
skillTree.description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -20% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc recruits
Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

backgroundSkills.name: Mushroom-Addicted
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)

backgroundSkills.name: Shroom Growa’
backgroundSkills.description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.

backgroundSkills.name: Shiny Lova’
backgroundSkills.description: Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Night Gobbo Loon
backgroundSkills.description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%

backgroundSkills.name: Bearded Choppas
backgroundSkills.description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.name: Beard Connoisseur
backgroundSkills.description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.name: Choppa Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

backgroundSkills.name: Stabba Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
